021import net.tnemc.item.persistent.PersistentDataType;
022
023/**
024 * PersistentLong
025 *
026 * @author creatorfromhell
027 * @since 0.2.0.0
028 */
029public class PersistentLong extends PersistentDataType<Long> {
030
031  public PersistentLong(final String namespace, final String key) {
032
033    super(namespace, key);
034  }
035
036  /**
037   * Returns the type of the PersistentDataType.
038   *
039   * @return The type of the PersistentDataType as a String.
040   * @since 0.2.0.0
041   */
042  @Override
043  public String type() {
044
045    return "long";
046  }
047
048  /**
049   * Encodes the value of the PersistentDataType into a string representation.
050   *
051   * @return The encoded string representation of the value
052   * @since 0.2.0.0
053   */
054  @Override
055  public String encode() {
056
057    return value.toString();
058  }
059
060  /**
061   * Decodes the given encoded string and sets the decoded value.
062   *
063   * @param encoded The string to be decoded
064   * @since 0.2.0.0
065   */
066  @Override
067  public Long decode(final String encoded) throws IllegalArgumentException {
068
069    return Long.parseLong(encoded);
070  }
071}
